text: The 1963 Bandy World Championship was the third Bandy World Championship and was contested between four men's bandy playing nations. The championship was played in Sweden from 20–24 February 1963. The Soviet Union became champions.http://www.bandysidan.nu/tavlinginfo.php?EVID=86&sprak;=eng&land;=3 ==Results== ==References== 1963 Category:1963 in bandy Category:1963 in Swedish sport Category:International bandy competitions hosted by Sweden Category:February 1963 sports events
title: 1963 Bandy World Championship
